summary: The mod adds a Khajiit companion to the game.
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/6/0/60c37e14.jpg [/img]

[youtube]3GQXpgddFu8[/youtube]

The mod adds 2 Khajiit companion in Skyrim. 
They are Mudcrab hunter.

Summon many mudcrab to fight.


[img] http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/3/2/3251571c.jpg [/img]




[b][color=#c33422]Location:[/color][/b] near Whiterun

[img] http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/7/f/7f5734ba.jpg [/img]




[b][color=#c33422]Mudcrab helmet:[/color][/b]
Men and women, all races support.
made of shell of mudcrab in smithing forge (daedric category)
And change red when it boiled (cooking)
(Do not forget the salt!)

[img] http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/otyahanabi/imgs/d/1/d1a6b522.jpg [/img]


[b][color=#c33422]Installation:[/color][/b]
Extract the files
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)

[b][color=#c33422]Uninstallation:[/color][/b]
Remove the file: ukc02.esp  ukc02.bsa

[b][color=#c33422]Recommend Mod:[/color][/b]
This mod don\'t include khajiit texture.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941] Cover Khajiit [/url]

[b][color=#c33422]Change log:[/color][/b]
1.1 - Minor fixes
author: Higeyosi and Dragonporn
